conversations.question: What is the discount on speech and language disorder diagnosis?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 90% discount on speech and language disorder diagnosis, including a detailed report

conversations.question: How many stuttering treatments am I entitled to per year?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to an 80% discount on stuttering treatment, up to 30 treatments per year

conversations.question: How many voice disorder treatments am I entitled to per year?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 75% discount on voice disorder treatment, up to 20 treatments per year

conversations.question: What is the discount on swallowing disorder diagnosis and treatment?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to an 85% discount on swallowing disorder diagnosis and treatment, including videofluoroscopy examination

conversations.question: How many developmental delay treatments am I entitled to per year?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 90% discount on developmental delay treatment, up to 40 treatments per year

conversations.question: What is the discount on hearing rehabilitation?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to an 80% discount on hearing rehabilitation, including hearing aid fitting
